key_risks: Extreme overbought RSI (83.25) suggests high risk of a corrective pullback.

short_term_outlook: Bullish trend remains intact but overbought conditions and proximity to resistance suggest a high probability of near-term consolidation or a pullback. A break above 247.10 could target 250-263, while a break below 236.18 could test 232.80 support.
